other_tests.findings: Showed hypoplastic olfactory bulbs and tracts in the three siblings.
Sibling A had profound bilateral sensorineural hearing loss; sibling B had normal audiometry; sibling C had an isolated sensorineural defect in high frequencies on the left side.

Abnormal olfactory tests with variable degrees of severity: sibling A had normal detection thresholds but abnormal identification thresholds, sibling B showed strongly hyposmic detection thresholds and severe identification disability, sibling C had detection thresholds at the upper normal limit but abnormal identification thresholds.
